_sText:
known bugs: 
		-fixed-
		

Just extract the file to

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\<accname>\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps


Changed (1.02):

replaced some lights with light_spot
added light for secred places


Changed (1.01):

added light in the middle jail
added buttons for opening the middle jail
new model for vent exit
reduced music variety
reduced music audible distance
removed HDR
reduced file size
